de.payleven.payment

Class PaymentRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.payleven.payment.PaymentRequest

  • public class PaymentRequest
extends Object
    Contains the data required in order to make a payment.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PaymentRequest(BigDecimal paymentAmount, Currency paymentCurrency, String paymentIdentifier, GeoLocation paymentLocation) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      GeoLocation getLocation()
      Deprecated. 
      As of release 1.2.1, replaced by getPaymentLocation()
      BigDecimal getPaymentAmount()
      Returns the amount to be charged in a decimal format, which must be at least one major currency unit (e.g 1.00 Euro) and cannot be negative or zero.
      Currency getPaymentCurrency()
      Returns the payment's currency.
      String getPaymentIdentifier()
      Returns the payment's identifier.
      GeoLocation getPaymentLocation()
      Returns the payment's location.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PaymentRequest

        public PaymentRequest(BigDecimal paymentAmount,
              Currency paymentCurrency,
              String paymentIdentifier,
              GeoLocation paymentLocation)
        Parameters:
        paymentAmount - Amount to be charged in a decimal format, which must be at least one major currency unit (e.g 1.00 Euro) and cannot be negative or zero.
        paymentCurrency - Three-letter alphabetic code according to ISO 4217 representing the payment's currency that must match the merchant country's local currency. Supported currencies are EUR, GBP and PLN.
        paymentIdentifier - Mandatory unique identifier (e.g order number) of the payment request. The identifier can be any set of alphanumeric characters [A-Z, a-z, 0-9]. Please retain this identifier for your records and for further reference (e.g Refund).
        paymentLocation - Custom geolocation object that requires the user's geolocation (longitude, latitude) at the time of the payment attempt.

    • Method Detail

      • getAmount

        @Deprecated
public BigDecimal getAmount()
        Deprecated. As of release 1.2.1, replaced by getPaymentAmount()

      • getPaymentAmount

        public BigDecimal getPaymentAmount()
        Returns the amount to be charged in a decimal format, which must be at least one major currency unit (e.g 1.00 Euro) and cannot be negative or zero.

      • getCurrency

        @Deprecated
public Currency getCurrency()
        Deprecated. As of release 1.2.1, replaced by getPaymentCurrency()

      • getPaymentCurrency

        public Currency getPaymentCurrency()
        Returns the payment's currency. A three-letter alphabetic code according to ISO 4217 representing the payment's currency that must match the merchant country's local currency. Supported currencies are EUR, GBP and PLN.

      • getId

        @Deprecated
public String getId()
        Deprecated. As of release 1.2.1, replaced by getPaymentIdentifier()

      • getPaymentIdentifier

        public String getPaymentIdentifier()
        Returns the payment's identifier. A mandatory unique identifier (e.g order number) of the payment request. The identifier can be any set of alphanumeric characters [A-Z, a-z, 0-9]. Please retain this identifier for your records and for further reference (e.g Refund).

      • getLocation

        @Deprecated
public GeoLocation getLocation()
        Deprecated. As of release 1.2.1, replaced by getPaymentLocation()

      • getPaymentLocation

        public GeoLocation getPaymentLocation()
        Returns the payment's location. A custom geolocation object that requires the user's geolocation (longitude, latitude) at the time of the payment attempt.
